thread.section_title: Current Analysis Reports - Business Technology and Software
thread.title: Amazon re:Invent – Amazon Looks to Disrupt with a New Cloud BI Offering
thread.title_full: Amazon re:Invent – Amazon Looks to Disrupt with a New Cloud BI Offering

author: Shimmin, Brad
title: Amazon re:Invent – Amazon Looks to Disrupt with a New Cloud BI Offering
text: October 08,   Intelligence Alert Amazon has unveiled a preview of a forthcoming cloud-borne BI service, creating a highly disruptive, enterprise-facing service that maximizes the vendor’s established data collection, processing and analytics portfolio.
